Package com.orchestranetworks.scheduler

This package allows the implementation of custom tasks in EBX5 scheduler.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ScheduledExecutionContext Context of a scheduled task execution.
 

Class Summary
ScheduledTask Task definition to be executed by the EBX5 task scheduler.
 

Exception Summary
ScheduledTaskInterruption Thrown to interrupt a ScheduledTask.
 

Package com.orchestranetworks.scheduler Description

This package allows the implementation of custom tasks in EBX5 scheduler.
